name: GetActorValue
desc: Get an actor value. [player.getav luck]

name: SetActorValue
desc: Set an actor value. [player.setav luck, 75]

name: ModActorValue
desc: Modify an actor value. [player.modav luck, -10]

name: PlayGroup
desc: IE: PlayGroup SEQNAME 1

name: IsMoving
desc: Is the actor moving?

name: IsTurning
desc: Is the actor turning?

name: PlaySound
desc: Play a 2D sound. (Optional: 1 to indicate a system sound, 0 otherwise

name: StartConversation
desc: Start a conversation [Bob.StartConversation Joe, SecretTopic]

name: EnablePlayerControls
desc: 7 optional (0/1) values. movement|pipboy|fighting|pov|looking|rollover|sneaking ex: 1 0 0 1 0 0 0

name: DisablePlayerControls
desc: 7 optional (0/1) values. movement|pipboy|fighting|pov|looking|rollover|sneaking ex: 1 0 0 1 0 0 0

name: GetPlayerControlsDisabled
desc: 7 optional (0/1) values. movement|pipboy|fighting|pov|looking|rollover|sneaking ex: 1 0 0 1 0 0 0

name: SetSize
desc: Shrink/Grow an actor. [player.shrink 0.0 or radius]

name: SetCellPublicFlag
desc: Set public flag on cell. [setpublic MyCell 1]

name: GetDefaultOpen
desc: Returns 1 if this object is open by default

name: SetDefaultOpen
desc: A value of 1 will make the object open by default

name: GetAnimAction
desc: Return the actors current anim action

name: SetOpenState
desc: A value of 1 will make the object open

name: SetInChargen
desc: A value of 1 will be in chargen

name: SetGhost
desc: A value of 1 will make the NPC act as a 'ghost'

name: GetIsGhost
desc: Returns 1 if the actor is acting as a 'ghost'

name: SetUnconscious
desc: A value of 1 will be unconscious

name: GetUnconscious
desc: Returns 1 if is unconscious

name: SetRestrained
desc: A value of 1 will be restrained

name: GetRestrained
desc: Returns 1 if is restrained

name: ForceFlee
desc: Forces a actor to flee if destination or cell is passed in uses them

name: SetWeather
desc: Sets the active weather to the specified type

name: ForceTakeCover
desc: Forces a actor to move away from the target actor for a period of time

name: ForceActorValue
desc: Does modav XXX (value - getav XXX). [player.forceav luck 25]

name: ModPCSkill
desc: Modify the Players Skill. [modpcs Blunt, 10]

name: ModPCAttribute
desc: Modify an actor value. [modpca luck, 10]

name: GetBaseActorValue
desc: Get a base actor value. [player.getbaseav luck]

name: IsOwner
desc: Get the ownership of the ref

name: IsCellOwner
desc: Get the ownership of the ref

name: ForceWeather
desc: Forces the active weather to the specified type, without transition

name: IsWaterObject
desc: Water condition used for drinking animation

name: SetScale
desc: Set the scale of an object

name: ModScale
desc: Modify the scale of an object

name: SetIgnoreFriendlyHits
desc: Set whether an actor should ignore friendly hits (0-no, 1-yes)

name: GetIgnoreFriendlyHits
desc: See if an actor is ignoring friendly hits

name: DamageActorValue
desc: Damage an actor value

name: RestoreActorValue
desc: Restore an actor value

name: TriggerHUDShudder
desc: Trigger shudder effect on HUD.  Params=Intensity/Duration

name: SetDisposition
desc: Sets the dispostion with modifiers

name: GetHitLocation
desc: What BGSBodyPart::LIMB_ENUM was hit. -1 = none, 0 = torso, ...

name: IsPC1stPerson
desc: Is the player playing in 1st person mode?

name: PurgeCellBuffers
desc: Forcibly unloads all unattached cells in cell buffers

name: GetCauseofDeath
desc: What killed the actor

name: IsLimbGone
desc: Is BGSBodyPart::LIMB_ENUM been dismembered

name: IsWeaponInList
desc: Is the current weapon in the form list

name: PlayIdle
desc: Play this idle on the current actor

name: ApplyImageSpaceModifier
desc: Adds an imagespace modifier to the active list

name: RemoveImageSpaceModifier
desc: Removes an imagespace modifier from the active list

name: ToggleMotionBlur
desc: Toggle Motion Blur for the selected reference

name: SetObjectiveCompleted
desc: Set objective completion status: 0-Off, 1-On

name: SetObjectiveDisplayed
desc: Set objective displayed status: 0-Off, 1-On

name: GetObjectiveCompleted
desc: Get objective completion status: 0-Off, 1-On

name: GetObjectiveDisplayed
desc: Get objective displayed status: 0-Off, 1-On

name: PipboyRadio
desc: Control the Pipboy radio. Enable, Disable, Tune

name: CompleteAllObjectives
desc: Complete all of a quest's objectives

name: DisableNavMesh
desc: Disable navmesh by FormID

name: EnableNavMesh
desc: Enable navmesh by FormID

name: SetNPCRadio
desc: Enable/Disable NPC radio playback: 0-Off, 1-On

name: GetPermanentActorValue
desc: Get an actor value ignoring temporary modifiers. [player.getav luck]

name: GetKillingBlowLimb
desc: Which BGSBodyPart::LIMB_ENUM received the killing blow

name: ShowAllMapMarkers
desc: Shows/hides map markers (1 shows, 0 hides)(1 travel(default), 0 no travel)(1 all, 0 all but hidden(default))

name: SetRumble
desc: Creates rumble in the controller (left motor) (right motor) (duration)

name: SetNoActivationSound
desc: Set the sound to play when activation fails (Sound)

name: ClearNoActivationSound
desc: Clear the activation failure sound

name: TriggerScreenBlood
desc: Trigger screen blood

name: TriggerScreenSplatter
desc: Trigger screen splatter

name: ClearScreenSplatter
desc: Clear screen splatter

name: SetScreenSplatterTexture
desc: Set screen splatter texture

name: SetScreenSplatterFade
desc: Set screen splatter fade time

name: SetCameraFOV
desc: Change the camera's field of view (in deg): default 75

name: PlaceAtReticle
desc: Put an object at the reticle location

name: ObjectUnderReticle
desc: Return the object under the reticle

name: GetDLCCount
desc: Returns how many DLC packages are installed

name: IsDLCInstalled
desc: Query if a particular DLC package is installed by file name or friendly display name.  Takes one string as a parameter

name: EnableLoadingMenu
desc: Enable or disables the loading menu

name: IsLoadingMenuEnabled
desc: Checks if the loading menu is open

name: IsActorRefEssential
desc: Is an actor reference essential

name: SetActorRefEssential
desc: Set actor reference to essential

name: IsNoHumanGoreExe
desc: Is this exe build with no gore

name: IncrementScriptedChallenge
desc: Increment a scripted challenge

name: PersistentRefCount
desc: Count Persistent References

name: AlwaysShowActorSubtitles
desc: Set actor to always show subtitles

name: SetRadioToDialogueOnlyMode
desc: Set radio to dialogue only mode

name: ShowSleepWaitMenu
desc: Show sleep wait menu

name: GetContainerInventoryCount
desc: Get number of items in a container

name: SystemSave
desc: Init a System Save

name: PrintTrackedCells
desc: Prints cell load and unload counts

name: ClearTrackedCells
desc: Clears all cell tracking data

name: EnableCellTracking
desc: Enables or disables cell tracking

name: GetInCharGen
desc: A value of 1 will be in chargen
